description: The men's Champions Trophy returns in 2025 after a eight-year hiatus - here's the full schedule for the eight-team tournament.
title: ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025: Schedule, fixtures, times & venues
title_page: ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025: Schedule, fixtures, times & venues - BBC Sport
maintext:
India beat New Zealand by four wickets to seal a record third Champions Trophy title after the event returned in 2025 following a eight-year hiatus.
Pakistan hosted the majority of the tournament, but India's group-stage games, semi-final and the final took place in Dubai.
Here are the results from each match in the eight-team tournament.
